Science has created
living robots from human cells to help
treat wounds or
injured people. This technology is expected to help
create breakthroughs in medicine and
bioengineering. These creatures are  The
microscopic bio-robot named anr robot is
developed from human cells similar to
the way a small planted seed
automatically develops and grows into a
plant. Each of these bio-robots also
develops from a  In human cells,
scientists have used activated cells from
donors of all ages and
genders. The robot will promote the
growth of nerve cells in damaged areas
and many other applications
in the future.  In the future, we can put
these robots into the body to perform
therapeutic tasks such as sensing tumors
or disease, creating molecules that support
regeneration, scraping MNs from artery walls
or repairing wounds and
Other defects: Biorobots have the advantage of
reducing the risk of immune reactions because they
are created from the patient's own cells.
Recently, scientists at the
Saigon Institute of Technology have made famous
strides.  significant in the effort to
develop green hydrogen through the use of a
solar reactor
with a diameter of 7 m and pointing the
reactor to the sky with a parabolic dish
mounted on top that looks like a
telescope. However, the design  The design is not
to receive radio waves but to use
sunlight and water to create hydrogen and oxygen,
with the app's name originating from the Latin word for
plant, which is expected to
solve the problems of growing
hyosan.  The operating principle of the app
is to use sunlight
reflected from a parabolic mirror and focus it on
a reactor placed at the focal point in a type of
reaction where the electric current generated by solar energy
will separate
water molecules.  H2O into hydrogen H2 and Ox O2. The
first plant is expected to come into operation in
Saigon in February next year. Hyosan is a

death.  Alley residents at 305 Le Van
Si Street, Phu 1, Tan Binh District, Ho Chi

house deep in the alley, so they shouted to
use extinguished water and
local means to extinguish the fire.  Controlling
the fire However, because the house contained many
flammable materials, the fire broke
out fiercely and covered the house, blocking all

many Northerners were trapped inside
many households.  Living next door, I was afraid of
the fire spreading so I moved to a safe area to
receive the news. The
Ho Chi Minh City Fire Prevention and Control Police sent
10 fire trucks from many units to the
scene to put out the fire and prevent it from spreading
in the house.  The residential area simultaneously organized
rescue plans when the fire
was extinguished. The authorities
discovered the bodies of two men in the
stairwell area and ground floor. The cause
of the fire is currently being investigated.
Today, the People's Committee of Lam Dong province

took place at the

forces according to the scenario of the Nuclear Research Institute's staff
transporting the
i131 open radioactive source to the vehicle at this time in the nuclear research facility's
corridor.  When a large fire broke out, the

reactor, disconnecting the power switches
due to  A large fire could affect the
reactor, so the provincial incident response process was
activated.
Lam Dong province's nuclear and radiation incident response command
announced the risk of a level three incident and the alarm level.
Immediately after that, the firefighting force was
present to control the fire. The
medical force gave first aid to the injured right at the

Sirius brand motorbikes.  She ran until she started the car and

Currently, there are more than 30 people who
